languages.text: В основании разрушенных весов открылась ниша с богатым сундуком

traits.locale_text: В основании разрушенных весов открылась ниша с богатым сундуком

languages.text: В расколотом основании весов виднеется сундук с подернутой патиной эмблемой Адептус Арбитес. Судя по эмблемам чистоты, его освятили прежде чем замуровать.
In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.
languages.original_text: В расколотом основании весов виднеется сундук с подернутой патиной эмблемой Адептус Арбитес. Судя по эмблемам чистоты, его освятили прежде чем замуровать.

traits.locale_text: In the broken base of the scales there is a chest with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it had been consecrated before being immured.
In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.
In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.
In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.
In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.

languages.text: In den geborstenen Sockel der Waage ist eine mit dem Emblem des Adeptus Arbites verzierte Truhe eingelassen. Dem Reinheitssiegel zufolge wurde sie vorher geweiht.
languages.original_text: In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.

traits.locale_text: In den geborstenen Sockel der Waage ist eine mit dem Emblem des Adeptus Arbites verzierte Truhe eingelassen. Dem Reinheitssiegel zufolge wurde sie vorher geweiht.

languages.text: Dans le socle brisé de la balance se trouve un coffre orné de l'emblème patiné de l'Adeptus Arbites. À en juger par les sceaux de pureté, il a été consacré avant d'être emmuré.
languages.original_text: In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.

traits.locale_text: Dans le socle brisé de la balance se trouve un coffre orné de l'emblème patiné de l'Adeptus Arbites. À en juger par les sceaux de pureté, il a été consacré avant d'être emmuré.

languages.text: 天平残损的底座上放着一个箱子，箱子上装饰着帝国法务部的徽章，如今已满是铜锈。箱子上的纯洁印记表明，它在固定之前接受过神圣祝福。
languages.original_text: In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.

traits.locale_text: 天平残损的底座上放着一个箱子，箱子上装饰着帝国法务部的徽章，如今已满是铜锈。箱子上的纯洁印记表明，它在固定之前接受过神圣祝福。

languages.text: En la base rota de la balanza hay un cofre decorado con el emblema del Adeptus Arbites, cubierto por una pátina. Los sellos de pureza indican que fue consagrado antes de emparedarlo.
languages.original_text: In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.

traits.locale_text: En la base rota de la balanza hay un cofre decorado con el emblema del Adeptus Arbites, cubierto por una pátina. Los sellos de pureza indican que fue consagrado antes de emparedarlo.

languages.text: 天秤の壊れた台座には、古びた風合いの高等裁定局の紋章で飾られた箱がある。その上に貼られた純潔の印章は、封印される以前にこの箱が聖別されていたことを物語っている。
languages.original_text: In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.

traits.locale_text: 天秤の壊れた台座には、古びた風合いの高等裁定局の紋章で飾られた箱がある。その上に貼られた純潔の印章は、封印される以前にこの箱が聖別されていたことを物語っている。

languages.text: Terazinin kırık kaidesinde, üzeri küfle kaplı Adeptus Arbites amblemi işlenmiş bir sandık duruyor. Saflık mühürleri, duvar içine gömülmeden önce kutsandığını gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: In the broken base of the scales is a chest adorned with the patina-covered emblem of the Adeptus Arbites. The purity seals suggest it was consecrated before being immured.

traits.locale_text: Terazinin kırık kaidesinde, üzeri küfle kaplı Adeptus Arbites amblemi işlenmiş bir sandık durur. Saflık mühürleri, duvar içine gömülmeden önce kutsandığını gösterir.
